channel.title: Writing on Chris Bennett
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Chris Bennett

item.title: Design of Project for Client
item.description: Some of my work lives behind an NDA, or some other form of agreement that says I can’t show it to you. Bummer. So, in place of that work, here is a choose your own adventure of how some of that work may have gone.1 The Start You sit alone at your desk. You gaze into the radiating glow of your monitor, waiting for inspiration. It doesn’t show up.
